old: 白竜様のご加護があらんことを
column2: May the blessings of The White Dragon, Lady Arisen, be with you.

old: リムの輝きは常に貴方と共に
column2: The radiance of Rift Crystal is always with you.

old: 旅の同伴者をお求めですか？　覚者様
column2: Are you looking for a travel companion, Lord Arisen?

old:
メンバーの再編をお考えでしたら
なんなりと
column2: If you are thinking of reorganizing your party members, please do not hesitate to ask.
